entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
